data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jepson, James E., Khramov, Alexander V., Ohl, Michael (2018): A substitute name for a genus of fossil mantispid (Insecta: Neuroptera: Mesomantispinae) from the Jurassic of Kazakhstan. Zootaxa 4455 (2): 400, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4455.2.10
